mapper.select: /* 특정 자격증 중분류 정보 조회 */ SELECT lsc.lsc_code ,lsc.lmc_code ,lsc.lmc_name ,lsc.lsc_name ,lsc_reg_id ,lsc_reg_datetime FROM license_sub_category AS lsc WHERE lsc.lsc_code = #{lscCode};
mapper.insert: /* 자격증 중분류 등록 */ INSERT INTO license_sub_category ( lsc_code ,lmc_code ,lmc_name ,lsc_name ,lsc_reg_id ,lsc_reg_datetime) VALUES (sf_new_license_sub_code(), #{lmcCode}, #{lmcName}, #{lscName}, #{lscRegId}, CURDATE());
mapper.select: /* 자격증 중분류 등록을 위한 대분류 목록 조회*/ SELECT DISTINCT lsc.lmc_code ,lsc.lmc_name FROM license_main_category AS lmc INNER JOIN license_sub_category AS lsc ON lmc.lmc_code = lsc.lmc_code
